question: Please, help my get my puppy back from the evil king. Here are some items that might help you on your quest. Choose wisely!

paths.name: desert
paths.goodMessage: Thankfully, the bottle of water ğŸ¥¤ saves you from dehydration.ğŸ– You may proceed.

question: You can see the puppy now but its guarded by a huge dragon ğŸ¶ ğŸ². Are you brave enough to continue?
